mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spot ( id, category, start_date, end_date, loc_category, address, review, grade, profile_id ) VALUE ( #{id}, #{category}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{locCategory}, #{address}, #{review}, #{grade}, #{profile} )
INSERT INTO photo ( photo, content_id ) VALUE ( #{photo}, #{contentId} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, c.title, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE content_id = c.id ) bookmark_count, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE content_id = c.id AND member_id = #{myMemberId} ) my_bookmark, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM good WHERE content_id = c.id ) good_count, ( SELECT created_at FROM content WHERE id = #{targetId} ) createdAt FROM spot s, content c WHERE s.id = c.id AND s.id = #{targetId}

SELECT c.id, c.title, s.grade, ( SELECT photo FROM photo WHERE content_id = c.id ) photo, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE content_id = c.id ) bookmark_count, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE content_id = c.id AND member_id = #{myMemberId} ) my_bookmark, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM good WHERE content_id = c.id ) good_count, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pin WHERE member_id = #{myMemberId} AND content_id = #{targetId} ) pin FROM content c, spot s WHERE c.id = s.id AND c.id IN ( SELECT content_id FROM owner WHERE member_id = #{myMemberId} ) LIMIT #{page}, 6
mapper.update: UPDATE spot SET category = #{category}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, loc_category = #{locCategory}, address = #{address}, review = #{review}, grade = #{grade} WHERE id = #{id};
